description: Canberra has a great variety of fun play spaces that engage and challenge children in their play. These range in size from the neighborhood play spaces in local parks, to the larger play spaces in most district parks. This dataset identifies the locations of Canberra's town and district parks.

name: Town And District Playgrounds
